title: Vintage Stamp Collecting
description: Test your knowledge of the beloved hobby of philately from the golden age of stamp collecting!

questions.question: What is the formal term for stamp collecting?
Which famous U.S. stamp, first issued in 1918, featured an upside-down airplane and became one of the most valuable stamps in the world?
What was the name of the small hinged paper used to mount stamps in albums before self-adhesive mounts became popular?
What term describes a stamp that has never been used or cancelled?
Which tool was essential for handling stamps without damaging them?
What did collectors use a perforation gauge to measure?
options: The size of the stamp image
The number of perforations per 2 centimeters

questions.question: Which country issued the world's first adhesive postage stamp, the Penny Black, in 1840?
What was the popular Scott Catalogue used for by stamp collectors?
What term describes the practice of collecting stamps still attached to their original envelopes?
Which U.S. president was a well-known stamp collector who helped popularize the hobby in the 1930s and 1940s?
What was a 'first day cover' in stamp collecting?
options: A protective sleeve for rare stamps
The cover page of a stamp catalog
The first stamp in a new album
An envelope postmarked on the first day a new stamp was issued

questions.question: What method did many young collectors use to remove stamps from envelopes?
What is a 'watermark' on a stamp?
options: A design pressed into the paper during manufacturing

questions.question: Which popular stamp series featured images of famous Americans and was widely collected in the 1950s and 1960s?
What were 'approval sheets' that stamp dealers mailed to collectors?
options: Sheets of stamps sent on approval for the collector to buy or return
